EmailTemplate.name: Alliance Reg Status Denied Email

EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Alliance_Registration__c.Partner_First_Name_Capitalized__c},
The registration for {!Alliance_Registration__c.Customer_Account_Name__c} was Denied for the following reason: {!Alliance_Registration__c.Denial_Reason__c}.
If you have questions, please reach out to:
sean.casey@turbobnomic.com – VP of Alliances
justin.kutticherry@turbonomic.com – Alliance Manager
Charles_Geisler@bmc.com – Business Development Manager
Regards,
The Turbo Team
